roleset.name: produce growling sounds, perhaps as speech

example.name: transitive
example.text: [`` Babies , kiddies , '']-1 growls [*T*-1] their manager -- a fellow named Earl Weaver , who , in a different time, handled four World Series teams and now handles the Gold Coast Suns .
example.arg: their manager -- a fellow named Earl Weaver , who , in a different time , handled four World Series teams and now handles the Gold Coast Suns

example.name: non-utterance
example.text: From a great distance thunder growled and broke the silence .

roleset.note: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls manner_speaking-37.3, nonverbal_expression-40.2, animal_sounds-38, sound_emission-43.2.
